# compileMF1MessageData() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Compile an ICU MessageFormat 1 message into a [Message](./messageformat.message.md) data object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function compileMF1MessageData(src: string, locale: string, { strict }?: MF1Options): Message;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  src | string | A Fluent resource, as the string contents of an FTL file. |
|  locale | string | The locale code to use for the message. |
|  { strict } | [MF1Options](./icu-messageformat-1.mf1options.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Message](./messageformat.message.md)
